sequence:
Sirius' Improvement Plan

<size=45>Chapter 2 - Her Majesty's Orders</size>

scripts.say: In the midst of my pondering on how to thank Sirius for her efforts...
I hereby command all my subjects to be in attendance at our next banquet to strengthen cross-faction ties!
Everyone must bring a partner with them! As for me, I will have Warspite as my escort!
And so, Her Tiny Majesty gave me a direct order to attend the banquet.
I've heard that the banquet will be very formal, and apparently we must dance with our partners...
I am here, please rest assured, my honourable Master.
...I must dress appropriately for the banquet? Is my maid uniform inadequate...?

...However, I believe that the more I stand out in a crowd, the lower the risk is of you being targeted, Master. Therefore, it's in your best interest that I attend the banquet in my regular maid uniform.
True, I guess showing to a banquet wearing that would make you really stick out...
Do you mean... attend the banquet as your partner?
Although I would be much obliged, I believe it would be considered inappropriate for you to bring a lowly maid as your partner, my honourable Master.
Furthermore, either Belfast or Curacoa would be superior choices, as I have never attended a public event as a guest before...
Even so, I'll accept the risk and choose you to be my partner.
Do you mean that... I can protect both Her Majesty and you at the same time, my honourable Master?
Oh, my apologies! I was unable to infer the meaning of your statement and I made a senseless remark...
Please, give this incompetent maid her due punishment!
In reality, I want this banquet to serve as a learning experience for her, but let's go with this version of the story for now.
